titles.title: Jesus, And Shall It Ever Be

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, and shall it ever be, A mortal man, ashamed of Thee? Ashamed of Thee, whom angels praise, Whose glories shine through endless days?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ashamed of Jesus! that dear Friend On whom my hopes of heaven depend! No; when I blush, be this my shame, That I no more revere His name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Till then, nor is my boasting vain, Till then, I boast a Saviour slain: And, oh, may this my glory be, That Christ not ashamed of me!{/lang-eng}
